alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:03PM CDT until March 29 at 10:52PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Steelville. Big River at Byrnesville. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River near Arnold. Black River near Annapolis. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to late Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.4 feet, Private road under the Highway F bridge becomes flooded at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 0.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 20.0 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Pacific 15.0 0.3 9.5 15.7 19.8 17.6 10.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
